Package com.cafean.document.notebook

Class OdfExporterModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.document.notebook.AbstractExporterModule
      • com.cafean.document.notebook.OdfExporterModule
  • public class OdfExporterModule
extends AbstractExporterModule
    This exporter module provides some utility methods for creating ODF specific components such as collapsible tables, anchors, references, etc. In many cases, these methods simply act as delegates for the ODF component creation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      OdfExporterModule​(java.io.File location, AbstractNotebookExporter exporter)

      • getStandardPageStyle

        public com.apt.doc.style.MasterStyleBlock getStandardPageStyle​(java.lang.String baseStyleName,
                                                               java.lang.String pageStyle,
                                                               java.lang.String headerText,
                                                               java.lang.String classificationLabel,
                                                               java.lang.String footerText,
                                                               int sectionTitleDepth,
                                                               boolean pageNumber,
                                                               boolean pageCount)
        Description copied from class: AbstractExporterModule
        Creates a standard page style with the given header text, classification label, and footer text.
        Specified by:
        getStandardPageStyle in class AbstractExporterModule
        headerText - header text that should be included
        classificationLabel - a classification label centered in the header
        footerText - footer text that should be included
        sectionTitleDepth - heading styles with this value will be included in the header
        pageNumber - if true a page number will be included in the footer
        pageCount - if true a page count will be included after the page number in the footer. This flag does nothing if the previous flag is false.
        See Also:
        StandardPageStyle, DocxPageLayout

      • getStandardRightLeftPageStyle

        public com.apt.doc.style.MasterStyleBlock getStandardRightLeftPageStyle​(java.lang.String baseStyleName,
                                                                        java.lang.String rightPageStyle,
                                                                        java.lang.String leftPageStyle,
                                                                        java.lang.String headerText,
                                                                        java.lang.String classificationLabel,
                                                                        java.lang.String footerText,
                                                                        int sectionTitleDepth,
                                                                        boolean pageNumber,
                                                                        boolean pageCount)
        Description copied from class: AbstractExporterModule
        Creates a right left page style with the specified parameters.
        Specified by:
        getStandardRightLeftPageStyle in class AbstractExporterModule
        rightPageStyle - the right page style
        leftPageStyle - the left page style
        headerText - the header text to display
        classificationLabel - the classification label to display
        footerText - the footer text to display
        sectionTitleDepth - paragraph headings with this outline level will be included as a * @param pageNumber if true a page number will be included in the footer
        pageCount - if true a page count will be included after the page number in the footer. This flag does nothing if the previous flag is false.
        See Also:
        StandardPageStyle, DocxPageLayout
